# Your App is built by ALTARI

## ðŸŒŸ Overview
ALTARI is a AI App Builder, Your app is built with Next.js and enhanced with beautiful UI components. It provides a seamless user experience with a clean and intuitive interface. All done by ALTARI ðŸ¤

## âœ¨ Features
- Modern and responsive design
- Beautiful UI components with ShadCN
- Optimized performance with Next.js
- Customizable components

## ðŸ”§ Prerequisites
Before you begin, ensure you have the following installed:
- Node.js (14.x or higher)
- npm (6.x or higher)

## ðŸš€ Installation
1. Clone the repository:
```bash
git clone [your-repo-link]
cd altari-be
```

2. Install dependencies:
```bash
npm install
```

## ðŸ’» Usage
To start the development server:
```bash
npm run dev
```
The application will be available at `http://localhost:3000`

## ðŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack
- [Next.js 12](https://nextjs.org/) - React Framework with Page Router
- [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) - Utility-first CSS Framework
- [ShadCN UI](https://ui.shadcn.com/) - Beautiful and accessible components
- [Lucide React](https://lucide.dev/) - Beautiful and consistent icons
